pageContent: Purpose: We determine the safety and feasibility of magnetic resonance image guided transurethral ultrasound prostate ablation using active temperature feedback control in a preclinical canine model with 28-day followup.

metaData.source:
Evaluation of Outcomes following Focal Ablative Therapy for Treatment of Localised Clinically Significant Prostate Cancer in Patients >70 Years: A Multi-institute, Multi-energy 15-year Experience
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/37014172/
